entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Temporarily disabling Win-ARM64 testing in PR #68626
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.Scan() #68625
  • Synchronization in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore is inconsistent with the memory model #68623
  • [API Proposal]: Add LifetimeAnnotationAttribute #68622
    7.0.0
  • Unobsolete IPAddress.Address, or create a new equivalent property #68619
  • Add Marvin32 to System.IO.Hashing #68616
    7.0.0
  • Investigate why createdump generated dumps are so large on MacOS #68604
    7.0.0
  • `NetworkChange` events are not working on WSL Ubuntu 20.04 #68602
  • System.Text.Json: Using JsonStringEnumConverter, after changing CurrentCulture to "sv-SE", enums with unknown negative values serialize strangely, and cannot be deserialized. #68600
  • ILCompiler.DependencyAnalysisFramework targets net5.0 which is out-of-support soon #68595
  • Reduce size overhead of corehost #68593
    Future
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_Array.RsaCryptRoundtrip_OaepSHA1 test failure #68590
  • [API Proposal]: Add PipeReader and PipeWriter overloads to JsonSerializer.SerilizeAsync/DeserializeAsync #68586
    Future
  • Crash occurs when using profiler at clr-samples(https://github.com/microsoft/clr-samples) #68585
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failure in `System.Text.Json.Serialization.Converters.ObjectWithParameterizedConstructorConverter`1.TryLookupConstructorParameter` #68584

Closed

  • CoreCLR tests build error on main for arm/armel/arm64 #68589
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debugger tests run correctly but something is stuck and the tests never exit #68570
  • Make sure that GenTree pointer is stored only in its parent. #13293
    Future
  • Test failure: Loader\\CollectibleAssemblies\\ResolvedFromDifferentContext\\ResolvedFromDifferentContext\\ResolvedFromDifferentContext.cmd #68112
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.TestUserCredentialsPropertiesOnWindows #65820
  • Single File publishing is not compatible with Windows 7 #62453
  • Test failure: System.BadImageFormatException: Could not load file or assembly #65646
    7.0.0
  • HostFxr fails to Initialize the host context when tried from a Native Code which is a Part of another .Net App #68388
  • Avx2.IsSupported not work correctly for release CoreRun #67798
  • clr.alljits subset fails cross-compiling for linux-x86 on linux-x64 #68044
  • Re-Enable RuntimeEventSource test. #12141
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'ssaNum != SsaConfig::RESERVED_SSA_NUM' during 'VN based copy prop' #68479
    7.0.0
  • Some outer loop tests on Linux fail unless run as root #62756
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.DirectoryInfo_SymbolicLinks.ResolveLinkTarget_ReturnFinalTarget_ChainOfLinks_ExceedsLimit_Throws #68454
  • Visual Studio restore is broken as projects are missing from the dependency closure #65552
    7.0.0
  • #65738 causes SIGSEGV running helloworld on linux-x86 preview 3 #68391
  • StreamPipeReader does not amortize ValueTask ReadAsync calls #30169
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create PFX file (PKCS#12) from .cer .key and password. #67987
  • [QUIC] Rewrite Open(Uni|Bidi)rectionalStream to leverage async stream opening #67302
    7.0.0
  • Unable to deserialize char-based Enum #68471
  • CreateXHarnessAppleWorkItems task failed unexpectedly when building iOS arm64 AllSubsets_Mono #67349
  • [API Proposal]: CollectionMarshal.AsSpan for a ReadOnlyCollection #68534
  • [QUIC] handle concurrent stream reads and concurrent stream writes #52627
    7.0.0
  • JIT ARM32: Assertion failed 'size == EA_4BYTE' during 'Generate code' #60827
    7.0.0
  • Hosted Services are run in serial #68587
  • CI hitting vm assert waitResult == WAIT_TIMEOUT in the tiered compilation manager #65914
    7.0.0
  • Frequently hitting marshaling asserts while working on Corelib in VS #68572
    7.0.0
  • `IServiceScopeFactory` is Documented Assumed to be a Singleton #67391
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Added the fix to make use of the heap hard limit instead of the region range while using large pages. #68629
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Maui Blazor Hybrid Android Performance Profiling #68628
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable win-arm64 runtime tests on PRs for CoreCLR #68627
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove gtSetCallArgsOrder quirk #68621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix firefox tests running on windows #68620
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Firefox - remove item from commands_received #68618
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove GTF_LATE_ARG #68617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable 4244 #68615
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Delete .NET Framework ildasm headers from test sources #68614
  • Use SYSLIB prefix for all LibraryImportGenerator diagnostics #68613
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Updating Complex to implement INumberBase and ISignedNumber #68612
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve rendering of some negated sets #68608
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update AOT toolchain target to NetCoreAppToolCurrent #68606
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Lock EnsureConfigured to prevent initialization issues in JsonTypeInfo #68605
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Minimize the build graph by deleting unnecessary references #68603
    area-Meta
  • Ensure decimal.TryWriteSignificandLittleEndian correctly takes endianness into account #68599
  • Add a cleanup job to backport workflow #68596
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm] print full json results of bench sample #68594
    area-System.Console
  • Copy propagate on `LCL_FLD`s #68592
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid byte[] allocation for IPAddressUtil.IsMulticast #68591
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Hoist the nullchecks for 'this' object #68588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Use x64 directory if running x64 process on arm64 apphost #68583
    area-Host
  • Allow empty directory values in FileSystemEventArgs/RenamedEventArgs ctors #68582
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Add UseSystemd() and UseWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting

Merged

  • crossgen2: Add --imagebase option #65567
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update ILAsm and IL SDK packages to support new IL keyword. #68598
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix process not being killed #68573
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Rework unloadability fix #68550
    breaking-change, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • skip the test when dotnet.exe is locked #66196
    area-System.IO, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Remove stores as operands of calls in LIR #68460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Close the xml quote in markdown #68609
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Clean up NonBacktracking doubly-linked changes #68514
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Copy the SSA name when cloning locals #68482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix linux-x86 compilation for clr.alljits subset #68046
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce leaked test files #68522
    area-System.IO
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • JIT: add standard range enable for register stress #68574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix VS complaining about missing projects in slns (continued) #68543
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add ValueTask pooling in more places #68457
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Vectorized MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #68210
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Rebind invalid breakpoints after receiving an update in that source file #64462
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Fix linux/arm64 emscripten provisioning #68492
    area-Build-mono
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1740216 #68575
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT ARM32: Fix wrong emitAttr passed for loads/stores in PUTARG_STK #68540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove an unnecessary assertion in tiering #68577
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] fix build config logic error, and pthread_getschedparam initialization #68563
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • Remove assert from LibraryImportGenerator #68579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add DI spec tests for scope factory singleton, hierarchical scopes #68517
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Use `TempFile` in a test instead of `Path.GetTempFileName()` #68576
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add a few more Regex timeout tests #68567
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • Add retry logic to FSW tests File/Directory_Move_Multiple_From_* #68066
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • WIP: CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Removed TempFile and TempDirectory from FileSystemWatcher Tests #68444
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Condition S.S.Cryptography tests on SHA1 signature support #67998
    area-System.Security
  • Type activator should be order agnostic #67493
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Adding the 2-parameter xplat shuffle helpers and accelerating them #68559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [release/6.0] Prevent debugger deadlock with code versioning logic #68367
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move EventPipe thread buffer allocation outside of lock #67936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] More LLVM refactoring to support LLVM 14.x. #68426
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Move reflection based converter and contract resolution logic to DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver #68496
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #67527
    area-Meta
  • [QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop #68288
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #67419
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #68352
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.x
  • [Release/6.0] Backport test fixes #68332
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
  • [HTTP/3] Build latest msquic locally in docker image #68558
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Unify SendContent cancellation between HTTP3 and HTTP2 #67954
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use a faster sort algorithm pdqsort for Array.Sort #68436
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    community-contribution
  • Aot annotation on System.Text.Json #67582
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reduce max shared memory object name length #68541
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • [wip] Run tests on more Android versions #64341
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • avoid Reflection in Quic #68189
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove unwrapping of OCTET STRING wrapping in EnvelopedCms. #68562
    area-System.Security
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] add support for parsing Unified TLS hello #68425
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How does workload versioning work? #25089

Closed

  • Process.Start() is not supported on Windows in dotnet SDK 6.0.202 #25063
  • `dotnet list package --outdated` exit code #25091
  • Bad exception when rollback file has invalid version #24680
    6.0.4xx
  • With .NET 6, need adding RID for Mariner 2.0 #25092

PullRequests

Created

  • Port changes from Main for fixing binary version issues. #25104
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Version updates for compliance checks #25103
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25090
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • update exception message for invalid rollback file #24973
    Area-Workloads
  • Update ubuntu version #24650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change tests to target 4.6.2 instead of 4.6.1 #25056
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add a test for native lib #25060
    Area-ILLink
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Set TargetFrameworkMonikerDisplayName for .NET Standard and .NET Core/.NET5+ projects. #24656
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Allow null conditional (?.) operator on left hand side of assignment #2883
    Working Set

Updated

  • Null-conditional assignment #6045
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Support default parameter values in lambdas #6051
    Working Set
  • Support for method parameter names in nameof() #373
    Working Set
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: "file private" visibility #5529
    Needs More Work
  • [Proposal]: ref readonly method parameters #6010
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fixed formatting of a list #6069

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Allow services to be exported per language server #61002
  • Getting projects from a solution (old vs. sdk style csproj) #60996
  • Code Cleanup option to Fix all warnings and errors set in EditorConfig #60994
    17.3
  • IImplementInterfaceService is implemented by calling a code action, but it should be the other way around #60990
  • IDE0057 drops `checked` and `unchecked` modifiers for range simplification #60988
  • EditorConfig UI should have an option to add a file header #60987
  • sort usings should be apart of code cleanup #60986
  • Typo in Code Cleanup UI #60985
  • Create Find-References API overload that allows searching for references to multiple symbols at once. #60984
  • Attempting bulk suppression using source code attribute in document doesn't suppress anything and silently fails #60983
    Backlog
  • [C# 9] IDE0017 is not shown for short constructor call #60982
    Backlog
  • C# VS 2022 Code Style | Formatting | Spacing not properly applying options #60981
    Backlog
  • Roslyn null refs in RuleSetEventHandler.Unregister #60980
    17.3
  • [Documentation] .NET Compiler Platform SDK link is invalid and just redirects to Bing #60978

Closed

  • IMethodSymbol doesn't have IsNew #60790
  • Incorrect define constant use in BuildServerConnection.cs #60553
    17.3
  • Verify changes to ConvertOnEnum test #60765
  • Verify change to ConstantValueToStringTest01 test #60767
  • The name of the generated event handler is invalid for generics classes. #59935
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in PdbSourceDocumentLoaderService.cs line 130 #60908

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for LSP semantic token refresh. #61003
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust timeout on helix runs to 15 minutes to ensure dumps are captur… #61001
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 'RelaxingShiftOperator' into 'main' #61000
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Cherry-Pick 60973 To 17.2 #60999
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #60995
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [LSP] Remove semantic tokens IsFinalized logic #60993
    LSP
  • Add support to inheritance margin to disambiguate same-named items. #60992
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Send semantic tokens refresh notifications when compilations are available #60991
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Cherry-Pick 60973 To 17.3 #60998
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, auto-merge
  • Forbid types with required members from substituting for where T : new() #60788
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't initialize the StackTraceExplorer tool window until it is invoked #60973
    Area-IDE, Next
  • insert into main for 17.3 before VS snap #60997
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge "extended nameof scope" feature #60770
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix typo in `#if` directive #60555
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Move the load of project completion providers to background #60950
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update source-generators.cookbook.md #60881
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Allow non-Roslyn languages to use Formatter API #60971
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Fix generate event handler with invalid name (#59935) #60810
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Update main to generate draft insertions #60989
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix exceptions for non-VS hosting of Roslyn #60979
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'main' into RelaxingShiftOperator #60972
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Simplify implementation of the "remove 'this' or 'me'" analyzer/fixer. #60966
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #60970
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Delete unused RPC streaming code from our OOP impl. #60974
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60975
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61004
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable .Net Core OOP by default #60163
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Enable declaration, implementation(in non-interfaces) and consumption of virtual static members. #60965
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings (approach #2) #60906
    Area-Analyzers
  • API for exposing imports (including global imports) from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-approved
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Portable to 1.7.0-beta-21315-03 #54131
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.3
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #53386
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Blocked, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.3
  • Ensure local function invocations and method references always have null receivers #56395
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improving DataProtection linkability #41411
  • Unstated build dependency for e2e tests + tests won't run #41408
  • Invalid form key returns internal server error #41407
  • SignalR JavaScript client: Updating query parameters during active connection #41405
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #41404
  • Perf improvement: json #41403
  • Allow to specify type to serialize in SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter #41399
  • F# asp.net 5.x app broken after migration to 6.x #41398
  • Hash in service-worker-assets.js is stale after build #41396
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Server .NET 6 Drag n Drop mobile devices #41394
  • Element’s attribute change causes performance lack when hosted the application in US region and accessed in India or Brazil location #41393
  • Try to improve or remove `IOQueue` for sends in Kestrel #41391
  • Blazor navigation not work properly on Safari iOS latest #41390

Closed

  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #5985
    Backlog
  • 7.0.0-preview.4 Backport: Endpoint metadata is not discovered from return types implementing IEndpointMetadataProvider if the method is async #41387
    7.0-preview4
  • Assembly Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation fails to load when running on Linux #41368
  • Perf regression: json #41392
  • .NET 6 application sometimes loading incorrect appsettings.{environment}.json #41381
  • Endpoint metadata is not discovered from return types implementing IEndpointMetadataProvider if the method is async #41384
    7.0-preview5
  • Unexpected Error if blazor page has same URl for two pages #41361
  • Remove allocation in ValueTask<object> response processing path #41376
    7.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure IResult types throw ArgumentNullExceptions on public methods #41412
    area-runtime
  • Zero byte reads support for EnableBuffering/FileBufferingReadStream #41410
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add support for RouteHandlerInvocationContext<> overloads #41406
    area-web-frameworks
  • Allow Multiple Wildcard Prefix Server Names of the Same Length in SNI Configuration #41402
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Try out 1es images #41400
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #40483
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Remove allocations in ValueTask<object> and Task<object> codepaths #41379
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5
  • Allow HttpSys zero-byte reads #41305 #41332
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • [release/7.0-preview4] Fix discovery of endpoint metadata from async route handlers #41388
    area-runtime, ask-mode
  • Fix discovery of endpoint metadata from async route handlers #41386
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix diff checks for ContentRoot and WebRoot #41182
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Update SDK #41158
    blocked, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Enable trimming for middleware and friends #41373
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure
  • Draft Surrogate argument list #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Determine next log file number from directory on first run #41375
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix MapPath and UsePathBase's use of implicit PathStrings #41382
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Throw BadHttpRequestException for non-ASCII in absolute-form targets #41334
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-stack report hangs when run in a directory without write permissions #3030
    .NET 7.0
  • CrashReport.json missing leading native frames on x64 MacOS 12 #2924
    .NET 6.0

Updated

  • dotnet-trace: unhandled exception results in a broken trace #2954
  • The "setsymbolserver -ms" added to the .lldbinit by dotnet-sos fails #3032
    .NET 7.0
  • ILogger guidance #1605
    .NET 7.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Write temp files to tempdir #3031
    bug, dotnet-stack

Updated

  • use viewport-relative coordinates #3034
    dotnet-counters, .NET 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve behavior for missing WebView2 Runtime on Blazor Hybrid Windows platforms #6575
  • [IOS] InputTransparenct always cascaded to Children even when CascadeInputTransparent= false #6574
  • Android - random Release build error #6573
  • VS2022Preview NetMaui - Problem with the application icon in IOS #6572
  • .NET MAUI MVVM OneWay bindings issues #6571
  • Maui Windows Button Images do not display #6570
  • building untrimmed application on Android on Release ends with Exception 'Unable to find Java.Lang.AbstractMethodError constructor' #6569
  • cannot debug or show output of Release built application on Android #6567
  • [Catalyst] GroupHeaderTemplate on CollectionView appears to be causing an infinite layout loop #6566
    6.0.300
  • Camera access after Blazor Hybrid Android removal of the `GetWebChromeClient` API #6565
  • TranslationY is ignored #6562
  • VerticalOptions.Center ignored on iOS, Droid and Windows #6561
  • Button Property Changes Ignored #6560
  • In RC2, FontImageSource does not work on Image.Source #6559
  • Shell: Top tabs are not displayed correctly (wrong color on Android, invisible on Windows) #6558
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • SearchBar background not changing on iOS #6555
  • Android: AppShell prevents gestures on native control #6553
  • Shell flyout background color does not change when behavior is set to Locked #6552
  • RC2 Solution can't build if CommunityToolkit.Maui is installed #6550
  • Provide a compiled version of FlexEnums and FlowDirection #6547
  • [iOS & MacOS] Preview 14 Shell Renders as Blank White/Black Screen on iOS & MacCatalyst #6545
  • Add new view in MAUI add dictionary template instead #6544
  • RC2 - Android - WidthRequest does not resize inside a DataTemplate in CollectionView #6541
  • RTL is not working in AbsoluteLayout #6540
    6.0.300
  • [bug][android]ModelPage will not work properly #6532
  • [bug][android]When I add controls using code, the ScrollView doesn't scroll #6530
    6.0.300
  • With UseMaui = true in class library I get a '"CopyLocalFilesOutputGroup" does not exist' error #6529
    6.0.300
  • Image clipping not working correctly on Android #6527
    6.0.300
  • ImageSrouce is not work when set Image.Source to file in external storage #6525
  • Collection in StackLayout incorrect padding and margins #6524
  • BarTextColour remains [white] for ToolBarItem on Android #6523
  • DisplayActionSheet from ToolBarItem action not displaying on pushed page on iOS #6522
  • CarouselView crashes with Loop="True" #6521

Closed

  • [ANDROID] Label with FormattedText does not render properly #6141
    6.0.300
  • Spans with FontAttributes do not render on Android #4729
    6.0.300
  • Hot Restart gives instant error #6554
  • Images don't load correctly on Android #6464
    6.0.300
  • In RC2, FontImageSource does not work on Image.Source #6551
    6.0.300
  • Grid with auto row and column not rendering child Frame with correct height on iOS when child has a margin #3489
    6.0.300
  • Grid with auto row and column not sizing correctly on Windows when child has a margin #3488
    6.0.300
  • Grid ColumnDefinitions aren't supporting data binding on Width property #6485
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Collection view empty in Mac #3280
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Editor height request not working on ios #3138
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] RadioButtonGroup properties not working in new .NET MAUI Layout (Worked with Preview 6) #2040
    6.0.300
  • LocalApplicationData folder isolation is inconsistent between Android and Windows #6533
    6.0.300
  • Default template has a double heading/title #5732
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Unable to find IAnimationManager for 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls #3353
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Nested Navigation Pages #4263
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • WebAuthenticator in Android not working #6534
    6.0.300
  • RC2 - ItemTemplate of CollectionView is not updated at runtime #6535
  • [Windows] Crash loading dynamic XAML content #4168
    6.0.300
  • RadioButton example from Xamarin Forms gallery converted to MAUI doesn't work on Android: radio buttons are not selectable #6093
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Failed publishing for Android with System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added #6531
  • AmbigousMatchException throwing when a control that inherent from Element is instantiated #4300
    6.0.300
  • Editor CursorPosition goes to start after adding any character to text #5803
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • ImageSrouce is not work when set Image.Source to file in external storage #6526
  • Shell Toolbar does not always show #5470
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Wrong targets are be compiled inside platform folders #5624
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix various combinations of Shell Elements on WinUI #6564
  • [android] update AOT profile #6548
    area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [iOS] Fix ItemSource duplication and Reset items index out of range on CollectionView #6546
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Fix incorrectly Button with image size #6542
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, control-button
  • [Xaml] add designTypeConverters for FlexEnums #6537

Merged

  • [Android] Fix positioning issues on Label Spans #6536
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, control-label
  • Fix Blazor Template for VS Windows #6568
  • Don't clear images to avoid Glide not loading images #6543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Use a stable value for the root type in xamlg #6556
    6.0.300
  • [WinUI] NavigationView fixing margins and corner radius #6513
    platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢
  • Merge the app and library sample projects #6549
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Remove the ShapesDemo from the sandbox #6563
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.2 to 4.12.0.8 #6327
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Updated Default project template #6319
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • [Core] Fix issue not finding IAnimationManager #6364
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬
  • Fix Toolbar property calculation when you have nested Nav Pages #6326
    area/navigation 🧭, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Fix AmbigousMatchException between duplicated types Core and Controls #6409
    t/bug
  • Bump Svg2VectorDrawable.Net from 0.1.0 to 0.3.0 #6265
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Build.Download from 0.11.0 to 0.11.1 #6335
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks from 7.0.100-preview.2.22102.8 to 7.0.100-preview.5.22226.1 #6506
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Move colors into separate file #6511
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.3

Updated

  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
  • Handle CA1416 violations found in MAUI repo #6237
  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Update ShellToolBar when applicable appearance elements change #6422
  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] MenuBarItems are now rendered when Shell.Title is not set #6497
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Return zero for scaled screen size when density is zero #6337

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sqlite - support for user defined aggregate window functions #27901
  • DbContext Thread Safe #27900
  • ArgumentException on loading database values of object owned by owned object #27899
  • Enabling stricter workflows for destructive migrations #27897
  • Switch to Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp 4.2.0 and unskip suppressor tests #27895
  • Caching layer for the update pipeline #27894
  • Query: Preserve selector for Count/LongCount #27893
  • Segmentation Fault when using Microsoft.Data.Sqlite v6.0.4 in ASP.Net Core 3.1 in official Alpine 3.15 #27892

Closed

  • Unnecessary join when GroupBy and Select #27297

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor UpdateSqlGenerator to separate select logic #27902
  • Remove ValueBuffer from update pipeline #27898

Merged

  • Downgrade Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp #27896
    auto-merge
